HEADING: Widget Code
MESSAGE_MULTIPLE_INSTANCES: To use multiple instances of this widget on the same page, like with a list of blog posts, simply generate the ids of the target element and pass that same id to the widget. For example, 'widget-id-0', 'widget-id-1', and so on.
MESSAGE_CUSTOMIZATION: This widget can be customized directly via CSS. It does not render in an iframe, so you can host all of the CSS on your site.
MESSAGE_DOCUMENTATION: Please note that some of these advanced options can be configured easily via the "Customize" link in the top right, meaning no coding is required.
WIDGET_LIVE_COMMENTING_DESCRIPTION: Customizable, live commenting for any page or app.
WIDGET_STREAMING_CHAT_DESCRIPTION: Streaming Chat for any Page or App.
WIDGET_COMMENT_COUNT_DESCRIPTION: This widget will add a comment count to any page.
WIDGET_COMMENT_COUNT_BULK_DESCRIPTION: This widget will add a comment count to any page. Used when displaying counts of many items in a list.
WIDGET_RECENT_COMMENTS_DESCRIPTION: This widget will add a list of recent comments to any page.
WIDGET_TOP_PAGES_DESCRIPTION: This widget will add a list of top pages, by comment count, to any page.
